attributes.action: remove the tax or significantly increase the tax-free allowance on redundancy payments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current tax law for redundancy only allows up to £30,000 to be paid tax free, anything above this amount is taxed.  £30k may sound high but redundancy payouts are frequently used to reduce the size of mortgages which are now far higher than the £30k limit or they are used as a buffer until new, often lower paid, work can be found.  In a similar way to Inheritance Tax, Redundancy Tax is very unfair as the government is taking money away from hard working people with no real justification at a time when they can least afford it.
